QuestData.Title: A Wandering Tale
QuestData.Description:
<This book might have a point, but the author is taking every possible detour along the way. Or maybe it's about the journey and not the destination...
In any case, Archivist Dreyden would probably be pleased to have his book back.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Wandering Tale to Archivist Dreyden in the Grove of Memory.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Wandering Tale to Archivist Dreyden in the Grove of Memory.
